options.label: Only the simplest games
options.text: Games that require no rehersal or prior knowledge. Easy to explain, great for audience members to join.

options.label: All but the most complicated games
options.text: Games that require either no or some experience from the players. E.g. for jams.

options.label: All the games
options.text: Show everything, even the ones that require dicipline and knowledge about rules or rythm. E.g. for rehersed shows.
